question.question-text: According to paragraph 1, postage stamps were first suggested

answer-list.answer-text: They date from around 10,000 B.C.
They have been in use for 12,000 years.
They have been found at only one location.
They were discovered by archeologists hundreds of years ago.

question.question-text: According to paragraph 1, the town of Clovis

answer-list.answer-text: is in Mexico
was founded in 1932
is where all members of the Clovis culture lived
is where the first remnants of an ancient culture were found

question.question-text: It is indicated in paragraph 1 that the tools found near Clovis, New Mexico, were

answer-list.answer-text: very rudimentary
similar to others found prior to 1932
rather advanced
similar to some found in Africa and Europe

question.question-text: According to paragraph 2, what conclusion have archeologists drawn from the Clovis finds?

answer-list.answer-text: That the Clovis tended to remain in one place
That the Clovis expanded relatively quickly
That the Clovis lived throughout the world
That the Clovis were a seafaring culture

question.question-text: It is mentioned in paragraph 3 that it is believed that the Clovis

answer-list.answer-text: lived in familial groups of four or five people
had a relatively stable population
lived only in New Mexico
spent summers and winters in different places
